vision: The continuous pursuit of self-development to ensure the delivery of excellent, impactful, and effective treatment programs
values: Flexibility in work | Competence and professionalism | Justice and transparency | Commitment to quality | Innovation and creativity | Social responsibility

directorProfile.name: Nidal Suleiman Abu Saleem
directorProfile.bio: An overview of the director of Al-Emad Physical Therapy Center
qualifications: Master of Clinical Rehabilitation Sciences, Jordan University of Science and Technology
Former lecturer in Neuropediatric at the Department of Science and Rehabilitation at the University of Jordan
The first to establish and manage the intensive physical therapy program in the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan
Head of the Early Intervention Program (EIP) at Al Hussein Association
Relationships with many of the most important and famous doctors in the world, cooperating with them for the benefit of patients

adult.title: Adult Physiotherapy Department
adult.intro: Comprehensive physiotherapy and rehabilitation program for adults treating various medical conditions and musculoskeletal injuries
methods: Manual Therapy and Medical Massage (Manual Therapy & Massage)

pediatric.title: Pediatric Physiotherapy Department
pediatric.intro: Specialized program for child treatment focusing on motor development and proper growth using interactive and fun methods
conditions: Congenital or acquired joint and bone disorders
Rehabilitation after surgical operations (tendon lengthening and SDR)
pediatric.therapy: Play-Based Therapy and Movement (Play-Based Therapy) with interactive and fun activities to help the child develop properly

intensive.title: Intensive Physiotherapy Program
intensive.intro: Specialized program for critical and complex cases requiring intensive and rapid treatment with close monitoring
intensive.duration: Session duration from 45 minutes to 4 hours depending on patient needs
benefits: Significant and rapid improvement in motor performance
Rapid rehabilitation for return to daily activities

techniques.title: Therapeutic Techniques Used
list: Release of tense and stuck muscles
Specialized programs for prevention and development

contact.location: Manhal Circle, Ziad Al-Sharaan building Al Jubaiha, Jordan
contact.quickContactText: Feel free to call us or send a WhatsApp message. Our team is ready to help you with any inquiries about our services or to schedule an appointment.

services.title: Our Services
services.physiotherapyDesc: Professional physiotherapy treatments for pain relief
services.massageDesc: Therapeutic massage to relax muscles and reduce tension
services.rehabilitationDesc: Complete rehabilitation programs for injury recovery
services.sportsDesc: Sports medicine and athletic performance enhancement

about.title: About Our Center
about.content: We are a specialized center in physiotherapy and rehabilitation with a team of expert professionals dedicated to providing the highest quality care and treatment.
about.vision: The continuous pursuit of self-development to ensure the delivery of excellent, impactful, and effective treatment programs
about.values: Flexibility in work | Competence and professionalism | Justice and transparency | Commitment to quality | Innovation and creativity | Social responsibility
about.bgPhysiotherapy: Physiotherapy Specialist with a Master's degree in Clinical Rehabilitation Sciences from the Jordan University of Science and Technology
about.bgLecturer: Former Lecturer in Pediatric Neurology at the Department of Rehabilitation Sciences at the University of Jordan
about.bgPioneer: Pioneer: First to establish and manage intensive physiotherapy programs in the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan
about.bgEIP: Director of Early Intervention Program (EIP) at Al-Hussein Society
about.bgCollaboration: International Collaborations: Maintains strong relationships with renowned doctors and experts worldwide, collaborating for patients' benefit
about.certBachelor: Bachelor's Degree in Physiotherapy from Amman Ahliyya University
about.certMaster: Master's Degree in Sports Medicine from the Middle East University
about.certDiploma1: Diploma in Cupping and Therapeutic Massage
about.certCPR: First Aid and CPR (Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation) Certification
about.missionContent: We are committed to providing world-class physiotherapy services that help our patients recover from injuries, manage pain, and improve their quality of life.
about.teamContent: Our dedicated team of experienced physiotherapists and specialists is committed to providing exceptional care and treatment for every patient. Each team member brings expertise and passion for helping patients achieve their recovery goals.
